name: americano
description: A robust and smooth coffee made by diluting espresso with hot water, offering a rich flavor without bitterness.

name: black coffee
description: Freshly brewed coffee with a bold and intense taste, perfect for coffee lovers who appreciate pure coffee flavor.

name: cold brew
description: Smooth, refreshing coffee made by steeping grounds in cold water for a low-acidity, full-bodied taste.

name: espresso
description: A concentrated coffee with a rich, bold flavor, served in a small shot, perfect for a quick energy boost.

name: cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foam, offering a creamy and rich taste.

name: coffee latte
description: A smooth coffee with steamed milk, providing a creamy texture and a mild, balanced coffee flavor.

name: macchiato
description: A shot of espresso with a small amount of steamed milk, creating a rich, strong coffee taste with a hint of creaminess.

name: milk coffee
description: A simple blend of coffee and milk, offering a smooth, creamy texture and a mild coffee flavor.

name: mocha
description: A delicious combination of espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk, creating a sweet, rich, and creamy coffee experience.

name: cappuccino ice blend
description: A refreshing iced version of cappuccino, blending espresso with milk and ice for a cool, creamy coffee treat.

name: caramel latte ice blend
description: An iced coffee treat with espresso, milk, and caramel syrup, delivering a sweet and creamy flavor.

name: chocolate espresso ice blend
description: A rich mix of espresso and chocolate, blended with ice for a decadent, refreshing coffee experience.

name: happy tea
description: A refreshing blend of tea with bright, fruity flavors, bringing a touch of happiness to every sip.

name: lucky tea
description: A delightful tea blend with herbal and fruity notes, perfect for a refreshing and uplifting experience.

name: lychee tea
description: A light, fruity tea with a sweet lychee flavor, offering a refreshing taste thatâ€™s both delicate and exotic.

name: peach tea
description: A sweet and fragrant tea with a refreshing peach flavor, perfect for a relaxing and fruity treat.

name: chocolate milk tea
description: A creamy milk tea with rich chocolate flavor, blending the sweetness of chocolate with the smoothness of milk.

name: lychee milk tea
description: A refreshing milk tea with a sweet lychee twist, blending fruitiness with creamy, smooth milk.

name: matcha latte
description: A creamy, green tea latte with rich matcha flavor, providing a smooth and earthy taste in every sip.

name: milk tea
description: A smooth and creamy blend of tea and milk, offering a mild and satisfying flavor.

name: peach milk tea
description: A creamy milk tea with a hint of peach, blending fruity and creamy flavors for a delightful taste.

name: black tapioca pearls
description: Classic chewy tapioca pearls, adding texture and sweetness to your favorite beverages.

name: white tapioca pearls
description: Soft and chewy tapioca pearls, perfect for adding texture to drinks with a subtle sweetness.

name: golden boba

name: jelly cubes
description: Soft and bouncy jelly cubes, bringing a fun texture and slight sweetness to your drink.

name: taro balls
description: Deliciously chewy taro balls, adding a unique, earthy flavor and texture to your beverage.

name: chocolate pudding
description: Creamy chocolate pudding, adding a smooth, rich chocolate flavor to your drink.

name: egg pudding
description: Silky egg pudding with a light sweetness, adding a creamy texture to your favorite drinks.

name: matcha pudding
description: A smooth matcha-flavored pudding, adding a mild, earthy taste to your beverage.

name: marshmallows
description: Fluffy, sweet marshmallows, offering a light and airy texture with a touch of sweetness.

name: milk foarm
description: Smooth milk foam for an extra layer of creaminess and texture on top of your drink.

name: butter croissant
description: A flaky, buttery pastry with a golden crust, offering a delightful texture and rich flavor.

name: chocolate cookie

name: matcha cookie

name: mochi

name: egg tart

name: passion panna cotta
description: A creamy, smooth panna cotta with a hint of passion fruit, offering a refreshing and tropical flavor.

name: flan
description: A creamy, caramelized custard with a smooth texture and sweet flavor, perfect as a dessert treat.

name: tiramisu
